vuePress-theme-reco joenix    2020

Mock Server

joenix

# Mock Server

Every project created by vue-scaff will have a mock-server built in. Developers can open or close in vuescaffrc.js.

Documentation of Mock

# Structure

.
├── src
│   └── mock
│ 
└── vuescaffrc.js

# Configure

in vuescaffrc.js

{
  mock: true; // Boolean
}

# Mock Json

filename: hello.json

{
  "object|2-4": {
    "10": "北京",
    "20": "上海",
    "30": "天津",
    "40": "重庆"
  }
}

# Use

visit: http://localhost:8080/mock/hello
